# Preface {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| include: false

renv::install("tidyverse")
renv::install("mmrm")
renv::install("emmeans")
renv::install("nlme")

library(tidyverse)
library(mmrm)
library(emmeans)
```



```{r}
#| echo: false

### This is the small example dataset, created from the low dropout
all <- haven::read_sas("data/all2.sas7bdat") 
colnames(all) <- tolower(colnames(all))

all <- all %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    aval = change + basval,
    week = dplyr::recode(as.character(time), "1" = "Week 2", "2" = "Week 4", "3" = "Week 8"),
    week = factor(week, levels = c("Week 2", "Week 4", "Week 8")),
    subject = factor(subject)
  )


### Larger dataset with low dropout rate
low <- haven::read_sas("data/low2.sas7bdat") %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    aval = change + basval
  )

high <- haven::read_sas("data/high2.sas7bdat") %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    aval = change + basval
  )
```
